short_summary: Rotary Chairs are required for delivery to 550 de la cité, Gatineau, Québec, J8T 0A7 by December 12, 2022. Only suppliers pre-qualified and who have been issued a supply arrangement are eligible to bid.
description: Rotary Chairs are required for delivery to 550 de la cité, Gatineau, Québec, J8T 0A7 by December 12, 2022. Only suppliers pre-qualified and who have been issued a supply arrangement are eligible to bid.
full_summary:
## Solicitation Details
### Contract Title
**Rotary Chairs**

### Publication Details
* Solicitation Number:  5Z011-23-0139
* Publication Date:   September 7, 2022
* Solicitation Status: **Expired** (Closed on September 20, 2022 at 2:00 PM)

### Contracting Entity and End User
* Library and Archives Canada (Bibliothèque et Archives Canada)
* Address: 395 Wellington Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0N4

### Tender Description
Library and Archives Canada is soliciting proposals for the purchase and delivery of office seating (rotary chairs) to 395 Wellington Street, Ottawa, Ontario.

### Description
The purchase and delivery of office seating to 550 de la Cité, Gatineau, Quebec, J8T 0A7 by December 12, 2022.

### Trade Agreements and Regions of Delivery
This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

### Regions of Delivery:
The winning bidder is required to deliver the rotary chairs to 550 de la Cité, Gatineau, Quebec, J8T 0A7.

### Evaluation and Eligibility
The tender requires that the bidder possess a valid Supply Arrangement to be eligible for a resulting contract. Non-Supply Arrangement holders are eligible to bid but are required to submit a Supply Arrangement application for evaluation.

### Contact Information
If you have any questions or require more information, please contact:

* Legault, Isabelle
* Email: receptiondesoumission-bidreceiving@bac-lac.gc.ca

### Documents
To view the solicitation documents, please visit the following links:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/13/c0c0c9edb91cf16302b309a18c3e0b43/23-0139_qa_document_1.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/07/34388ca482837164e9f97e6c513ee66d/23-0139_os_standard_rfp_rotary_chair.pdf
* https://canad
